title: Enterprise Development Program (EDP)
summary: Comprehensive entrepreneurship training program designed to equip aspiring entrepreneurs with the skills and knowledge needed to start and grow successful businesses.
description: The Enterprise Development Program is our flagship initiative, providing six months of intensive training covering business planning, financial management, marketing, and operations. Participants receive mentorship, access to resources, and networking opportunities that help them transform their business ideas into reality.
impact: Over 500 entrepreneurs trained, 150+ businesses launched, 300+ jobs created

title: Integrated Professional Skills Development Program (IPS-DP)
summary: A holistic professional development program that combines technical skills training with essential soft skills for career advancement.
description: The Integrated Professional Skills Development Program prepares individuals for success in today's competitive job market. The program covers project management, communication, leadership, digital literacy, and industry-specific technical skills. Participants work on real-world projects and receive personalized career coaching.
impact: 400+ professionals trained, 85% career advancement rate, 250+ job placements

title: Green Innovation Program (GIP)
summary: Empowering entrepreneurs to build sustainable businesses that address environmental challenges while creating economic value.
description: The Green Innovation Program focuses on sustainable business practices and environmental stewardship. Participants learn about renewable energy, waste management, sustainable agriculture, and eco-friendly product development. The program includes access to green technology resources and connects participants with sustainability-focused investors and partners.
impact: 200+ green businesses launched, 100+ environmental projects, significant waste reduction

title: STRIVE Business Development Program (SBDP)
summary: Comprehensive support program for existing small businesses looking to scale and achieve sustainable growth.
description: STRIVE provides established small businesses with the tools, knowledge, and support needed to scale effectively. The program includes business diagnostics, growth strategy development, financial planning, marketing support, and access to funding opportunities. Participants receive ongoing mentorship and join a network of successful entrepreneurs.
impact: 300+ businesses supported, average 150% revenue increase, 400+ jobs created

title: Enterprise Development Program (EDP)
summary: Launch, grow, and scale MSMEs for investment opportunities
description: Our EDP aims to launch, grow, and scale MSMEs, making them attractive for investment opportunities. Hence, we build sustainable, growth-oriented businesses, improve livelihoods, promote economic inclusion, and contribute to Liberia's broader development and resilience goals.

title: Incubation and Mentorship Support (IMS)
summary: Targeted business development services and mentorship
description: At the DKS Incubation Center, our incubation program provides targeted business development services to emerging entrepreneurs, including access to co-working space, business advisory, peer learning platforms, and tailored growth plans. Entrepreneurs are paired with experienced mentors who provide consistent guidance, industry expertise, and professional coaching from idea validation through scale-up.
impact: 158 businesses reported growth in revenue and market reach

title: Integrated Professional Skills Development Program (IPS-DP)
summary: Continuing education for professionals and graduates
description: Our IPS-DP provides continuing education and professional development for junior and mid-level professionals, graduates, and aspiring leaders in areas like strategic planning, project management, fundraising, leadership, and innovation, building a pipeline of skilled professionals to drive organisational and community impact.
impact: 1,500+ young people provided career readiness training

title: Research, Data, and Innovation Hub (RDIH)
description: The Center generates actionable market and socio-economic insights to guide entrepreneurs, partners, and policymakers. Through research and innovation, we help businesses make evidence-based decisions and strengthen the entrepreneurial ecosystem.
impact: Guiding entrepreneurs and policymakers with data-driven insights

title: Strive Business Development Programme (SBDP)
summary: Comprehensive business development in partnership with UOF
description: Implemented in partnership with the Universal Outreach Foundation (UOF), the Strive Business Development Programme provides comprehensive business development support, including personalized mentoring, business clinics, and access to finance. The program has demonstrated significant impact with 15% revenue growth and 44% profit increase among participating businesses.
impact: 15% revenue growth, 44% profit increase, 50 businesses accessed loans

title: Green Innovation Programme (GIP)
summary: Sustainable business solutions and climate adaptation
description: Our Green Innovation Programme focuses on sustainable business solutions, environmental justice, and climate adaptation and mitigation. In collaboration with the Adaptation Accelerator Program, we integrate climate resilience training into entrepreneurship programs, promoting best practices in environmental sustainability and climate-smart innovation.
impact: Promoting climate adaptation and sustainable business practices
